haberman.rhizomatics.map.polys

Class PolySound

  • java.lang.Object
    • haberman.rhizomatics.map.polys.PolySound
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CyclicOverlay, PolygonOverlay

    public class PolySound
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the root polygon which describes every markers within Rhizomatics. It will interpolates an initial list of LatLng describing the core area of the listening point. Computing a given amount of peels, this class becomes capable of animation. It's a solution I've found to start_animation animating polygons, since we can't do it in mapbox (can't use AnimatedVectorDrawable, can't extend the final Polygon)...
    See Also:
    git issue #247
